Name: The Fourth Ring
Text: 19 GR. React, Boot: After your dude succeeds at a spell pull while not at home, you may discard a card from your hand to gain 1 ghost rock and draw a card.

Name: Law Dogs
Text: 19 GR. Noon, Boot: Choose a dude.  Boot your dudes with a total influence greater than the chosen dude's influence to raise that dude's bounty by 1.

Name: Morgan Cattle Co.
Text: 18 GR. Noon, Boot: Boot one of your dudes to play a deed, reducing the deed's cost by the dude's influence. Move that dude to that deed.

Name: The Sloane Gang
Text: 18 GR. Noon, Boot: Boot your dude in town square. If that dude is still in town square during the Sundown phase, either you gain 1 ghost rock per other player, or your dude permanently gets 1 control point if they do not already have one.

Name: Micah Ryse
Text: Huckster 0. Noon: Boot a Hex on Micah to move him.

Name: Mongwau the Mighty
Text: Huckster 1. Shootout:  Discard a Hex from Mongwau to make him a stud.

Name: Bobo
Text: Abomination. Bobo gains a bullet bonus equal to the highest Huckster skill rating in play.

Name: Arnold McCadish
Text: React, Pull, Boot: When a dude is discarded as a casualty in a shootout, if the pull is higher than the dude's value, send that dude home booted instead.

Name: The Ghostly Gun
Text: Abomination. Resolution: Put The Ghostly Gun into your draw hand; he becomes the suit and value of your choice. Discard a card from your draw hand.

Name: Avie Cline
Text: Harrowed. Huckster 0.

Name: Kevin Wainwright
Text: Noon:  Move Kevin to the same location as a Huckster.  Kevin becomes a stud.

Name: Tyxarglenak
Text: Abomination.  Other players cannot choose or affect your Hucksters at this location with action cards if they could legally choose to affect Tyxarglenak instead.

Name: Jia Mein
Text: Huckster 1. Shootout: Attach a Hex to Jia Mein (paying all costs) to make him a stud.

Name: Ivor Hawley
Text: Abomination. Huckster 2. While he has a Hex, Ivor gets +1 bullets, +1 influence, and +1 Huckster skill.

Name: Lucinda "Lucy" Clover
Text: If your opponent in Lucy's shootout reveals a cheatin' hand, raise the bounty on each dude in their posse by 1.

Name: Judge Harry Somerset
Text: Deputy. Noon Job, Boot: Harry leads a job that marks a wanted dude. If successful, ace the mark.

Name: Philip Swinford
Text: Deputy. Each time a player reveals a cheatin' hand and your hand is legal, you may discard a card from your play hand to draw a card.

Name: Tommy Harden
Text: Deputy. If your opponent in Tommy's shootout reveals a cheatin' hand, raise your draw hand rank by 1 for this round. If your draw hand is also legal, raise your hand rank by 2 instead.

Name: Prescott Utter
Text: Prescott's bullets and influence are equal to the number of Law Dogs at his location.

Name: Andreas Andregg
Text: Deputy. Mad Scientist 0.

Name: Xiong "Wendy" Cheng
Text: Deputy. Shootout, Boot: Send an opposing dude home booted.

Name: Clyde Owens
Text: Noon: Clyde calls out a dude at his location. A wanted dude cannot refuse the call out.

Name: Abram Grothe
Text: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a Holy Ground deed.  If succesful, discard all Abominations and wanted dudes at that deed.

Name: Sheriff Dave Montreal
Text: Deputy. If your opponent in Dave's shootout reveals a cheatin' hand and you do not, your dudes cannot be casualties this round.

Name: Irving Patterson
Text: When Irving joins a posse, gain 1 ghost rock.

Name: Prof. Eustace True
Text: Mad Scientist 1. Noon:  Discard a Gadget from Eustace to move him to another location.

Name: Elander Boldman
Text: Mad Scientist 2. Shootout, Pull: Choose your dude with a Weapon Gadget in this shootout.  If the pull is a club, discard that dude.  Otherwise that Gadget gets +3 bullets.

Name: James Ghetty
Text: Mad Scientist 0. When James enters a posse, place 4 ghost rock on him. The ghost rock may be used to pay for Shootout abilities.  Discard his unsed ghost rock after the shootout.

Name: Jon Longstride
Text: Noon: Unboot Jon's Horse. You may use the Horse's ability an additional time.

Name: Lane Healey
Text: Lane gets +2 bullets while he has a Horse.

Name: Jarret Blake
Text: Shootout: If Jarret has a Horse, swap him with one of your dudes in the posse.

Name: Harold Aimslee
Text: Mad Scientist 2. Noon, Boot: Discard a card from your hand to get a non-Weapon Gadget from your discard pile. Show the card and add it to your hand.

Name: Rémy LaPointe
Text: Shootout, Pay 1-4 Ghost Rock: Rémy gets +1 bullets for each ghost rock spent, to a maximum of 5 bullets.

Name: Max Baine
Text: Max is worth 1 control point while you control 2 or more Ranches.  Your other dudes at Ranches get +1 influence and +3 value.

Name: Allie Hensman
Text: Noon, Boot:  If Allie is at the town square, she permanently gets 1 control point.

Name: Fred Aims
Text: Fred's influence is equal to his bounty.

Name: Lawrence Blackwood
Text: Noon, Boot:  If Lawrence is at a deed you do not own, he is worth 1 control point while he stays at that deed.

Name: Marion Seville
Text: Marion gets +2 bullets while he is wanted.

Name: Sanford Taylor
Text: Noon, Boot: Call out a dude at this deed.  If Sanford is wanted, the call-out cannot be refused.

Name: Barton Everest
Text: If you reveal a cheatin' hand in Barton's shootout raise your draw hand rank by 1 for this round.

Name: Jonah Essex
Text: Huckster 1. Other wanted dudes in Jonah's posse get +1 bullets.

Name: Silas Aims
Text: Silas' bullets are equal to his bounty.

Name: Sloane
Text: Sloane's bounty cannot be reduced below 1. Sloane and your other dudes at her location do not boot when forming or joining a posse.

Name: Clementine Lepp
Text: While in a Saloon you own, Clementine gets +1 influence and cannot be called out.

Name: Ramiro Mendoza
Text: When Ramiro joins a posse, you may pay 1 ghost rock. If you do not or cannot pay, discard him.

Name: Steele Archer
Text: Huckster 2.

Name: Travis Moone
Text: Grifter. React, Boot: At the start of the game, shuffle your play hand into your deck and draw 5 cards.

Name: Androcles Brocklehurst
Text: Noon, Boot: Choose another player's dude at a deed you own but don't control. Gain ghost rock equal to that dude's influence.

Name: Dr. Dawn Edwards
Text: Mad Scientist 0. If you discard Dawn as a casualty, you may search your deck for Eve Henry, and play her for free at this location. Shuffle your deck.

Name: Eve Henry
Text: Abomination. If you discard Eve as a casualty, you may search your deck for Dr. Dawn Edwards, and play her for free at this location.  Shuffle your deck.

Name: Bank of California
Text: Public. Players cannot take ghost rock from the Bank's controller.

Name: Pony Express
Text: Public. Controller Noon, Boot: Discard a card to draw a card.

Name: Gomorra Parish
Text: Private. Holy Ground. Controller Noon, Boot:  Ace a card from your hand to gain 1 ghost rock.

Name: The Town Hall
Text: Government. Public. Controller React, Boot: At the start of the Upkeep phase, choose a dude at this location. Lower that dude's upkeep by their influence.

Name: 1st Baptist Church
Text: Private. Holy Ground. Raise the controller's hand size by one.

Name: Yan Li's Tailoring
Text: Private. Controller Noon, Boot: Raise a dude's influence by 1.

Name: B&B Attorneys
Text: Private. Controller Noon, Boot: Raise of lower the bounty on a wanted dude by one.

Name: Dead Dog Tavern
Text: Private. Saloon. Determine control of this deed using bullets instead of influence.

Name: Charlie's Place
Text: Public. Saloon. Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the bullets of a dude at this location by 2.

Name: Pearly's Palace
Text: Public. Saloon. Controller React, Boot: After a shootout starts but before any player makes a Shootout play, make a Shootout play.

Name: Killer Bunnies Casino
Text: Public. Saloon. Casino. The controller of this deed may discard one additional card each Sundown phase.

Name: Stagecoach Office
Text: Public. Controller React, Boot: When you bring a non-token dude into play, place that dude at any location you control.

Name: Blake Ranch
Text: Private. Ranch. Out of Town.

Name: Cattle Market
Text: Private. Ranch. This deed has 1 control point if another Ranch is in play. All dudes have their value raised by 3 while at this deed.

Name: Circle M Ranch
Text: Private. Ranch. Controller Noon, Boot: If you have 3 or fewer cards in your play hand, draw a card.

Name: Pat's Perch
Text: Private. Strike. Out of Town.

Name: Bunkhouse
Text: Private. Dudes with 0 or 1 influence have +1 influence while at this deed.

Name: Morgan Research Institute
Text: Private. Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the skill rating of a dude at this location by 2.

Name: Carter's Bounties
Text: Private. Controller Shootout, Boot: Move your dude into your posse from any location.

Name: The Union Casino
Text: Public. Casino. Saloon. Controller Noon, Boot:  Choose your dude at this location pay any amount of ghost rock.  Each other player may then pay any amount of ghost rock. If you paid at least 4 ghost rock more than any other player, your dude permanently gets 1 control point.

Name: Jackson's Strike
Text: Private. Strike. Out of Town.

Name: Undertaker
Text: Private.  This deed's controller gains 2 ghost rock each time a dude is aced.

Name: General Store
Text: Private. Controller Noon, Boot: Attach a goods or spell, reducing the cost of that card by 2 ghost rock.

Name: The Pharmacy
Text: Private. Controller Noon, Boot: Unboot a dude.

Name: Railroad Station
Text: Private. Controller Noon, Boot: Move your dude from this location to another location.

Name: Telegraph Office
Text: Private. Controller Noon, Boot: Choose a dude that was brought into play this Noon phase. Gain ghost rock equal to the dude's influence.

Name: Pair of Six-Shooters
Text: Weapon. Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: One card in your draw hand changes to the suit and value of your choice.

Name: Bluetick
Text: Sidekick. Noon, Boot: Move this dude to the same location as a wanted dude.

Name: Peacemaker
Text: Weapon. This dude cannot be changed to a draw, and cannot have their bullets lowered by another player's Shootout ability.

Name: Shotgun
Text: Weapon. Shoutout, Boot: Choose and ace an opposing dude in this shootout with a value less than or equal to this dude's bullets.

Name: Whiskey Flask
Text: Noon, Boot:  Boot this dude and discard a card from your hand to draw a card.

Name: Mustang
Text: Horse. Noon, Boot: Move this dude.

Name: Pearl-Handled Revolver
Text: Weapon.  This dude is a stud.

Name: Roan
Text: Horse. React, Boot:  Prevent this dude from booting when they join a posse.

Name: Auto-Revolver
Text: Weapon. Gadget. Difficulty 7. You may equip this Gadget as a Shootout play.  When forming a shootout hand, when you redraw after discarding at least one card, you may draw one extra card.

Name: Pinto
Text: Horse. Shootout, Boot: Move this dude into a posse.

Name: Flame Thrower
Text: Weapon. Gadget. Difficulty 8. This dude is a stud. Shootout, Pay 1-3 Ghost Rock, Boot: Raise the bullets on this Gadget by 1 for each ghost rock spent. Each round's loser takes 1 extra casualty.

Name: Force Field
Text: Gadget. Difficulty 5. Repeat Resolution, Pay X Ghost Rock:  Raise your draw hand rank by X for this round, but not to exceed your opponent's hand rank.

Name: Quickdraw Handgun
Text: Weapon. Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: If you have a legal draw hand, exchange draw hands with the cheatin' player. Cheatin' cards cannot be played on you for this round of the shootout.

Name: Mechanical Horse
Text: Horse. Gadget. Difficulty 5. Repeat Noon, Pay 2 Ghost Rock:  Move this dude. React, Boot: Prevent this dude from booting when they join a posse.

Name: Tin Star
Text: Wanted dudes cannot refuse a call-out from this dude.

Name: Doyle's Hoyle
Text: Mystical. React, Boot: If this dude makes a pull or is in a posse, you may discard the pull or a card from your draw hand to replace it with this card.  If the discarded card was a 2, raise your draw hand rank by one.

Name: Buffalo Rifle
Text: Weapon. If this dude is adjacent to the location of a shootout or a job's mark, they can join a posse, without moving or booting, even if booted.

Name: Legendary Holster
Text: Weapon. Mystical. Unique. Shootout Pull, Boot: If the pull is lower than this dude's bullets, ace one dude in the opposing posse.

Name: Auto Cattle-Feeder
Text: Improvement. Gadget. Difficulty 7. After this is invented, attach it to a Ranch that you control. Controller Noon, Boot: Gain 1 ghost rock.

Name: Soul Blast
Text: Hex. Shootout Hex X, Boot: Choose a dude in this shootout, X is that dude's grit. If successful, send the dude home booted. Ifsuccessful by 6 or more, ace the dude instead. If unsuccessful, move this Huckster home booted.

Name: Ace in the Hole
Text: Hex. React Hex 6, Boot: When you reveal your draw hand in a shootout, boot this Huckster.  Ace a card in your draw hand.  Replace it with a card from your play hand.

Name: Shadow Walk
Text: Hex. Noon Hex 7, Boot: Move this Huckster to any location. Shootout Hex 7, Boot: Move this Huckster to join your posse.  You may make another Shootout play.

Name: Blood Curse
Text: Hex. Noon Hex 9, Boot: A dude at this or an adjacent location gets -1 influence and -1 bullets. Shootout Hex 9, Boot: One opposing dude gets -2 bullets.

Name: Raising Hell
Text: Hex. Shootout Hex 8, Boot: Ace a card from your play hand. One Abomination from your Boot Hill enters play (pay all costs) and joins this Huckster's posse. Ace this card.

Name: Establishin' Who's in Charge
Text: Noon Job: Mark an in-town deed. If successful, the deed permanently gains 1 control point.

Name: Hired Guns
Text: Noon: Place a dude from your discard pile into your hand.

Name: Lady Luck
Text: Noon: You can discard as many of your cards as you like during Sundown.

Name: Bottom Dealin'
Text: Cheatin' Resolution: Discard the cheatin' player's draw hand and replace it with the top five cards of your deck.

Name: Make the Smart Choice
Text: Shootout: Reduce a dude's bullets by their influence. The dude's controller may move them home booted.

Name: Tresspassin'
Text: Noon: Choose a Private deed you own. Other players' dudes there must move home booted, or gain 1 bounty each.

Name: Auction
Text: Noon: Choose a deed in play. It becomes Private. If you own and control that deed, gain 1 ghost rock for each dude controlled by another player at that deed.

Name: The Stakes Just Rose
Text: Shootout: Move one of your dude into your posse.  That dude becomes a stud.

Name: Sun in Yer Eyes
Text: Shootout: Choose a dude this shootout. That dude gets -2 bullets (minimum 0) and becomes a draw.

Name: Ambush
Text: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a dude. If the mark is not wanted, raise the bounty on each dude in your posse by 1. If successful, ace the mark.

Name: Coachwhip!
Text: Cheatin' Resolution: The cheatin' player must boot a dude. If in a shootout, that dude gets aced instead. If you have a legal hand, you choose the dude to boot or ace.

Name: War Paint
Text: Noon: One of your dudes gets +2 bullets.

Name: Bad Company
Text: Noon:  Choose a wanted dude.  That dude gets +3 bullets and is a stud.  If this dude is discarded or aced, the player responsible gains 4 extra ghost rock.

Name: Hiding in the Shadows
Text: Noon: Choose on of your dudes. Other players cannot choose or affect that dude with Shootout abilities.

Name: Pistol Whip
Text: Shootout: Boot your dude in this posse to send a dude in the other posse home booted.  Your dude gets -1 bullets.

Name: Concealed Weapons
Text: Noon: You may use shoppin' as a Shootout play, and at any location.

Name: Hot Lead Flyin'
Text: React: After you take casualties for losing a round of a shootout, pull.  For each dude you have (still in the posse) with a value higher than the pull, the winner takes 1 casualty.

Name: One Good Turn …
Text: Noon: Draw a card. Cheatin' Resolution:  Gain 3 ghost rock.

Name: Kidnappin'
Text: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a dude. Your posse must have more total bullets than the marked dude.  Raise the bounty of each dude in your posse by 1.  If successful, discard the mark.

Name: Pinned Down
Text: Shootout: Choose a dude. They must be selected as the first casualty.  If that dude is chosen to be the shooter, they get -3 bullets.

Name: Run 'Em Down!
Text: Noon: Choose any number of your dudes, each with a Horse, at one location. Move them to an adjacent location that has an opposing dude without a Horse.  Boot that dude. You may call that dude out.

Name: Bounty Hunter
Text: Noon: A 2-Stud Gunslinger token enters play at a wanted dude's location.  The Gunslinger calls out that dude, who cannot refuse.  Remove the Gunslinger token from the game after the shootout.

Name: Reserves
Text: Noon: Gain 1 ghost rock.

Name: Rumors
Text: Noon: Choose a dude.  That dude gets -1 influence while at any location except home.

Name: Cheatin' Varmint
Text: Resolution:  Pay 5 ghost rock to lower a player's draw hand rank by 2 ranks. Cheatin' Resolution:  Lower a player's draw hand by 2 ranks.

Name: Fresh Horses
Text: Noon: Unboot all your Horses at one location. Any abilities on the Horses that have been used can be used an extra time.

Name: Magical Distraction
Text: Cheatin' Resolution: Discard a spell from your dude in this posse and pull. Your draw hand rank equals the value of your pull.

Name: Extortion
Text: Noon: Choose a deed that you control but do not own. Gain ghost rock equal to its production.

Name: Recruitment Drive
Text: Noon Job: Mark the town square. If successful, put a dude or deed into play from your discard pile, reducing its cost by 5 ghost rock.

Name: Unprepared
Text: Shootout: Boot a dude and their attached cards. That dude gets -1 bullets and cannot use abilities.  Their attached cards lose all traits, abilities, and bullet bonuses.

Name: A Coach Comes to Town
Text: Noon Job:  Mark the town square.  If successful, gain 4 ghost rock. If not, each player with a dude in the opposing posse gains 4 ghost rock.

Name: Hex Slingin'
Text: Resolution: Discard a Hex from your dude in this posse to raise your draw hand rank by 2.

Name: This Is a Holdup!
Text: Noon: Boot your dude at a deed you don't own to take ghost rock from the owner up to the production of that deed.  Raise the bounty on your dude by the amount of ghost rock taken.

Name: Clear Out!
Text: Noon: Move your dude to a deed that you own but do not control.

Name: Missed!
Text: Shootout: Unboot one of your dudes in this posse.

Name: Takin' Ya With Me
Text: React: After you take casualties for losing a round of a shootout, your opponent takes 1 casualty unless each dude in their posse has higher bullets than the highest bullets among your casualties.

Name: Good Stiff Drink
Text: Noon: Choose a dude's ability that has been used. That ability can be used another time.

Name: Point Blank
Text: Resolution: Boot your stud dude in this posse. Your opponent must ace a dude in their posse with lower bullets than your dude's bullets.

Name: A Secret Tunnel
Text: Noon: Move your dude from one in-town deed you own to another in-town deed you own (without booting). Make another Noon play.

Name: Joker
Text: This card is only used for draw hands and pulls. You choose its suit and value. Ace the joker after use.

Name: Joker
Text: This card is only used for draw hands and pulls. You choose its suit and value. Ace the joker after use.

Name: Gunslinger
Text: Token. Cannot be included in decks. Remove this token from the game after this shootout.
